targets.formattedQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Аналитика событий (ClickHouse)', user=1 */
SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as time, count() as events FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64(1764434603715/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64(1764607403715/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.query: SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as time, count() as events FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql: WITH time_series AS (SELECT toStartOfHour(toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) + INTERVAL number HOUR) as time FROM numbers(toUInt64(dateDiff('hour', toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3), toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3)) + 1)) WHERE time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3)) SELECT ts.time, if(e.events IS NULL, 0, e.events) as events FROM time_series ts LEFT JOIN (SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as time, count() as events FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time) e ON ts.time = e.time ORDER BY ts.time

targets.formattedQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Аналитика событий (ClickHouse)', user=1 */
SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as time, uniq(session_id) as active_users FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64(1764514424220/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64(1764687224220/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.query: SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as time, uniq(session_id) as active_users FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql: SELECT toStartOfHour(event_time) as time, uniq(session_id) as active_users FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Аналитика событий (ClickHouse)', user=1 */
SELECT pathname, count() as views FROM analytics.events WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND event_time >= toDateTime64(1764432304622/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64(1764605104622/1000, 3) GROUP BY pathname ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 10
targets.query: SELECT pathname, count() as views FROM analytics.events WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY pathname ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 10
targets.rawSql: SELECT pathname, count() as views, uniq(session_id) as unique_sessions FROM analytics.events WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY pathname ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 10

targets.formattedQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Аналитика событий (ClickHouse)', user=1 */
SELECT count(DISTINCT session_id) as online_users FROM (SELECT session_id, max(event_time) as last_activity, maxIf(event_time, event_type = 'page_unload') as last_unload FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64(1764686855110/1000, 3) - INTERVAL 10 MINUTE GROUP BY session_id HAVING last_activity >= toDateTime64(1764686855110/1000, 3) - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND (last_unload IS NULL OR last_unload < last_activity))
targets.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT session_id) as online_users FROM (SELECT session_id, max(event_time) as last_activity, maxIf(event_time, event_type = 'page_unload') as last_unload FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) - INTERVAL 10 MINUTE GROUP BY session_id HAVING last_activity >= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND (last_unload IS NULL OR last_unload < last_activity))
targets.rawSql: SELECT count(DISTINCT session_id) as online_users FROM (SELECT session_id, max(event_time) as last_activity, maxIf(event_time, event_type = 'page_unload') as last_unload FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) - INTERVAL 10 MINUTE GROUP BY session_id HAVING last_activity >= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE AND (last_unload IS NULL OR last_unload < last_activity))

targets.formattedQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='Аналитика событий (ClickHouse)', user=1 */
SELECT event_type, count() as total FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64(1764433604234/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64(1764606404234/1000, 3) GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY total DESC
targets.query: SELECT event_type, count() as total FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY total DESC
targets.rawSql: SELECT event_type, count() as total FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY total DESC

targets.query: WITH funnel AS (SELECT uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'page_view') as visitors, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_add_to_cart') as added_to_cart, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_order_complete') as orders FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3)) SELECT 'Посетители' as stage, visitors as count, 100.0 as pct_from_start, 100.0 as pct_from_prev FROM funnel UNION ALL SELECT 'Добавили в корзину', added_to_cart, if(visitors > 0, round(added_to_cart * 100.0 / visitors, 2), 0), if(visitors > 0, round(added_to_cart * 100.0 / visitors, 2), 0) FROM funnel UNION ALL SELECT 'Оформили заказ', orders, if(visitors > 0, round(orders * 100.0 / visitors, 2), 0), if(added_to_cart > 0, round(orders * 100.0 / added_to_cart, 2), 0) FROM funnel
targets.rawSql: WITH funnel AS (SELECT uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'page_view') as visitors, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_add_to_cart') as added_to_cart, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_order_complete') as orders FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3)) SELECT 'Посетители' as stage, visitors as count, 100.0 as pct_from_start, 100.0 as pct_from_prev FROM funnel UNION ALL SELECT 'Добавили в корзину', added_to_cart, if(visitors > 0, round(added_to_cart * 100.0 / visitors, 2), 0), if(visitors > 0, round(added_to_cart * 100.0 / visitors, 2), 0) FROM funnel UNION ALL SELECT 'Оформили заказ', orders, if(visitors > 0, round(orders * 100.0 / visitors, 2), 0), if(added_to_cart > 0, round(orders * 100.0 / added_to_cart, 2), 0) FROM funnel

targets.query: SELECT toDate(event_time) as time, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'page_view') as visitors FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql: SELECT toDate(event_time) as time, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'page_view') as visitors FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

targets.query: SELECT toDate(event_time) as time, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_add_to_cart') as added_to_cart FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql: SELECT toDate(event_time) as time, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_add_to_cart') as added_to_cart FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

targets.query: SELECT toDate(event_time) as time, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_order_complete') as orders FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
targets.rawSql: SELECT toDate(event_time) as time, uniqIf(session_id, event_type = 'custom_order_complete') as orders FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

targets.query: SELECT multiIf(user_agent LIKE '%Mobile%' OR user_agent LIKE '%Android%' OR user_agent LIKE '%iPhone%' OR user_agent LIKE '%iPad%', 'Mobile', user_agent LIKE '%Tablet%', 'Tablet', 'Desktop') as device, count() as events FROM analytics.events WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY device ORDER BY events DESC
targets.rawSql: SELECT multiIf(user_agent LIKE '%Mobile%' OR user_agent LIKE '%Android%' OR user_agent LIKE '%iPhone%' OR user_agent LIKE '%iPad%', 'Mobile', user_agent LIKE '%Tablet%', 'Tablet', 'Desktop') as device, count() as events FROM analytics.events WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY device ORDER BY events DESC

targets.query: SELECT duration_range, sessions FROM (SELECT multiIf(duration <= 30, '0-30 сек', duration <= 60, '30-60 сек', duration <= 300, '60-300 сек', duration <= 600, '300-600 сек', '600+ сек') as duration_range, multiIf(duration <= 30, 1, duration <= 60, 2, duration <= 300, 3, duration <= 600, 4, 5) as sort_order, count() as sessions FROM (SELECT session_id, dateDiff('second', min(event_time), max(event_time)) as duration FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY session_id) GROUP BY duration_range, sort_order) ORDER BY sort_order
targets.rawSql: SELECT duration_range, sessions FROM (SELECT multiIf(duration <= 30, '0-30 сек', duration <= 60, '30-60 сек', duration <= 300, '60-300 сек', duration <= 600, '300-600 сек', '600+ сек') as duration_range, multiIf(duration <= 30, 1, duration <= 60, 2, duration <= 300, 3, duration <= 600, 4, 5) as sort_order, count() as sessions FROM (SELECT session_id, dateDiff('second', min(event_time), max(event_time)) as duration FROM analytics.events WHERE event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY session_id) GROUP BY duration_range, sort_order) ORDER BY sort_order

targets.query: SELECT replaceRegexpOne(pathname, '/product/(\\d+).*', '\\1') as product_id, count() as views, uniq(session_id) as unique_viewers FROM analytics.events WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND pathname LIKE '/product/%' AND event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY product_id HAVING product_id != '' ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 10
targets.rawSql: SELECT replaceRegexpOne(pathname, '/product/(\\d+).*', '\\1') as product_id, count() as views, uniq(session_id) as unique_viewers FROM analytics.events WHERE event_type = 'page_view' AND pathname LIKE '/product/%' AND event_time >= toDateTime64($__from/1000, 3) AND event_time <= toDateTime64($__to/1000, 3) GROUP BY product_id HAVING product_id != '' ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 10
